item.title: Arduino Setup
item.description: Arduino must first be setup on your computer. https://create.arduino.cc/projecthub/Arduino_Genuino/getting-started-with-arduino-web-editor-on-various-platforms-4b3e4a?f=1 Install Arduino Create Agent for your Browser https://github.com/arduino/arduino-create-agent Load Basics: Blink Choose your Board upload the sketch Once this works, you are ready to go forward.
